definition: Hanoi, capital of Vietnam
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]
inside/inner/internal/within/interior

sentences.english: OK. Here's the story as I am told it.
sentences.chinese: 在河内的中部有个寺庙。

sentences.english: The spat in Hanoi suggested that the pact has yet to materialise.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在河内发生的争吵显示这一协议并没达成。

sentences.english: When it rained, the soil washed away, down the hills and into the rivers.
sentences.chinese: 当下雨的时辰，泥土被冲走，从赡上滑下进进河内。

sentences.english: Rescued the crew was on the 23rd arrived in Hanoi Noi Bai International Airport.
sentences.chinese: 获救船员已于23日抵达河内内排国际机场。

sentences.english: Vietnamese workers arrange steel structures at a construction site in downtown Hanoi January 18, 2006.
sentences.chinese: 越南工人在河内市区的一处工地整建钢铁构造。

sentences.english: This fowl had been sold to a cocker in Ha Noi.
sentences.chinese: 这鸡已被出售给库克在河内。

sentences.english: Property prices have been soaring in central Hanoi.
sentences.chinese: 在河内市中心，房地产价格一直在飙升。

sentences.english: All this means that strong move forward is needed from Hanoi.
sentences.chinese: 所以这一切都意味着，河内需要一场强有力的改革。

sentences.english: A vietnamese flower vendor sorts roses in hanoi .
sentences.chinese: 河内一名越南卖花小贩正在拣选玫瑰。

sentences.english: Yang met with Japanese Foreign Minister Seiji Maehara in Hanoi on that morning.
sentences.chinese: 杨洁篪当天上午在河内会见了日本外务大臣前原诚司。

sentences.english: And Phnom Penh to Angkor, Saigon to Honai.
sentences.chinese: 金边到吴哥，西贡到河内。

sentences.english: Useful diplomacy, but little else, at the summit in Hanoi.
sentences.chinese: 河内亚太峰会，外交显身手，但成果寥寥。

sentences.english: The Temple of Literature in Hanoi is a good example.
sentences.chinese: 在河内的文庙是一个很好的例子。

sentences.english: Big money is being made in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City.
sentences.chinese: 河内和胡志明市正在创造巨大财富。

sentences.english: ON THE edge of Hanoi brick-walled factories lie abandoned, weeds sprouting in their ruins.
sentences.chinese: 在河内的廃弃围墙工厂边缘，野草在废墟中萌芽。

sentences.english: This was approved just prior to Dong Xuan becoming a commune of Hanoi.“We
sentences.chinese: 这让东川优先成为河内的一个区。

definition: Hue, city in central Vietnam and capital of Thua Thien province

Da Nang or Danang, Vietnam
land route/to go by surface transport
Kansai region, Japan/Guanxi or Kuanhsi town in Hsinchu County 新竹縣|新竹县[Xin1 zhu2 Xian4], northwest Taiwan
Xinye county in Nanyang 南陽|南阳[Nan2 yang2], Henan
Wancheng district of Nanyang city 南陽|南阳[Nan2 yang2], Henan
Busan Metropolitan City in South Gyeongsang Province 慶尚南道|庆尚南道[Qing4 shang4 nan2 dao4], South Korea
Cheongju, capital of North Chungcheong Province, South Korea 忠清北道[Zhong1 qing1 bei3 dao4]
Xingyang city and county in Henan
Pyongyang, capital of North Korea
Jishou county level city in Hengshui 衡水[Heng2 shui3], Hebei
